title: Warning when using optimize
description:
Now it throws a warning in the log when doing an optimize:

DirectUpdateHandler2
Starting optimize... Reading and rewriting the entire index! Use with care.

This should probably be just an INFO level.

comments.author: Jan Høydahl
comments.content:
This is by design. SOLR-3141 for background.
Please file questions about Solr on the mailing list (http://lucene.apache.org/solr/resources.html#community) before opening a bug issue. I'm closing this JIRA now.
